Q-Games' latest PixelJunk title, Dreams of Another, launches on October 10, 2025!
A brand-new third-person exploration action game for PS5 & PS VR2.
Fire your gun to create the world and embark on a journey through a mysterious dreamworld.

🎮 Platforms: PlayStation®5 / PlayStation®VR2
📅 Release Date: October 10, 2025
🕹️ Genre: Action, Adventure

#ps5 #ps5games #psvr2 #psvr2games

author: PlayStation
description:
The full songlist for Just Dance 2026 Edition is finally here! 💃🕺

From the literal song of the year APT. by ROSÉ & Bruno Mars to timeless pop anthems like Girls Just Want To Have Fun by Cindy Lauper, including fan favorites like Houdini by Dua Lipa, this new edition is loaded with bangers!🎵 
Whether you're the life of the party, a gym addict or a homebody, this 40 hot songs tracklist is here to make you move. 🪩

Dance to your favorite tracks when Just Dance 2026 Edition releases, on October 14, 2025! 🎶

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Just Dance 2026 Edition - Full Songlist Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/kingdom-two-crowns/

👑Rejoice! Kingdom is celebrating 10th anniversary👑
The latest FREE birthday party update for Kingdom Two Crowns is out on PlayStation - join in on the fun now!🥳

Gather coins, build defenses and reclaim your fallen Kingdom. Explore and uncover secrets, unlock new technologies and protect your crown versus waves of Greed monsters that come at night. Kingdom is a solo or co-op micro-strategy and tower defense game set in an atmospheric pixel world.

#ps4 #ps4games #kingdom
title: Kingdom Two Crowns - Anniversary Trailer | PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/overwatch/

Masks, Mythics, and mayhem await in Season 19: Haunted Masquerade!

Join us for this year’s spooktacular Halloween event, Haunted Masquerade! Grab a mask of a fellow teammate and discover new ways to synergize when you use powerful new ability combos.

Sojourn, Torbjörn, and Hazard are stepping into the Stadium arena this season with exciting new Powers and Items you won’t want to miss. Gadgets are also making their Stadium debut in the Armory, giving you even more ways to power up your Hero and dominate the competition.

Go green or go home with Lifeweaver’s new Divine Druid Mythic Hero Skin which you can unlock by using the 80 Mythic Prisms you earn through the Season 19 Ultimate Battle Pass.

And that’s just the beginning! Be on the look out for brand new Shop Bundles, a returning fan-favorite collaboration, and SO much more!

Season 19: Haunted Masquerade creeps in on Oct 14!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #overwatch2
title: Overwatch 2 - Season 19: Haunted Masquerade Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

Available NOW!
From the world of Lost Eidolons comes an all-new roguelite tactical RPG. Awake on a mysterious island of damned souls, where your only hope of
survival lies in strategic combat. Choose your paths, allies, weapons, skills wisely in your quest to recover what's lost, braving death time and again.

LOST EIDOLONS: VEIL OF THE WITCH
Available now in Standard and Deluxe Editions

author: PlayStation
description:
Buy Now: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008528

Bye Sweet Carole is now available on PS5.

Experience a haunting hand-drawn adventure on PlayStation 5 as Bye Sweet Carole brings classic animation to life in this atmospheric narrative-horror game. Follow Lana Benton as she searches for her missing friend Carole Simmons across two haunting realms: the eerie Bunny Hall orphanage and the mysterious kingdom of Corolla. Solve intricate puzzles, sneak past deadly enemies, and transform into a rabbit to escape sinister threats.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Bye Sweet Carole - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/indiana-jones-and-the-great-circle/

This October is MachineGames’ 15-year anniversary and this update is our anniversary gift for all players of Indiana Jones and the Great Circle™.

The update contains three main additions that have climbed high on the community’s wish list: New Game+, the iconic Cairo outfit, and voice language select.

Winner of over 80 awards and awarded D.I.C.E “Adventure Game of the Year”, Indiana Jones and the Great Circle delivers an immersive experience that allows you to step into the boots of the renowned archaeologist.

ESRB RATING: Teen with Violence, Blood and gore, Mild language, Drug reference

#ps5 #ps5games #indianajonesandthegreatcircle
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle - MachineGames Anniversary Update Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/code-vein-ii/

A battle to save the world from ruin… Let’s go.
 
Uncover a dramatic story that transcends time.  To save the future, you must seek the legendary heroes of the past. If granted the power to alter history, what choices will you make? And what if your meddling might end up costing more lives?
 
Select your arsenal from a trove of weapons and abilities and join with all new partners on an epic adventure.
 
Bound By Blood – CODE VEIN II releases January 30th, 2026.

#ps5 #ps5games #codevein2
title: Code Vein II - Story Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10015727

Frenetic roguelike shooter Sweet Surrender comes to PlayStation VR2 on October 30th.

Fight your way to the top of a dystopian Megatower using guns, grenades, swords, snipers, and everything else at your disposal in frenetic VR shooter Sweet Surrender. As one of the last vestiges of humanity, you must wage war against a robot army and make your way to the freedom that lies at the top. 

Engage in agile combat, running, teleporting or even ziplining across the battleground in perfect comfort. Pick from a wide variety of firearms and melee weapons, and use overpowered upgrades to turn yourself into a customized combat machine – from electromagnetic blasts to even slowing down time. No two runs are the same: as you fight you’ll discover shortcuts and hidden levels, and unlock new classes that change your playstyle. 

Features:
- PlayStation VR2 exclusives: Adaptive Triggers, Haptic Feedback & 90fps visuals.
- Endless combat: Choose fr
title: Sweet Surrender - Announcement Trailer | PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012610

Who knew the world needed two treasure hunters to save it. Yooka-Replaylee is now available on PlayStation 5

Yooka-Replaylee is an open world 3D platformer and a reimagining of the beloved Yooka-Laylee. In this retelling of their biggest adventure to date, Yooka and Laylee share the story about how they took on the corporate creep Capital B who attempted to change the course of the universe by stealing the One Book, with a few embellishments sprinkled in for good measure. 

Step into a wacky adventure across many fantastical and imaginative worlds, full of colourful characters and vault-loads of shiny collectibles and save the world!

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Yooka-Replaylee - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10015158/

What should have been a simple factory sale turns into a quest across Europe to find a missing heir. Embark on the amazing journey of Syberia - Remastered, available on PlayStation 5 on November 6th!

Rediscover the clockpunk universe of Benoît Sokal in this fully remastered version of the first Syberia game. Join Kate Walker and Oscar, a strange and charming automaton, in pursuit of the brilliant inventor Hans Voralberg, and embark on an adventure more immersive and poetic than ever.

#ps5 #ps5games #syberia
title: Syberia - Remastered - Story Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10014070

Crafted with passion by the dream team that redefined side-scrolling beat 'em ups, Absolum mixes top-of-the-class combat action with modern roguelite elements, bringing all the vibes of the fantasy arcade hits of the past into an immersive adventure set in the original world of Talamh.

Meet the four playable heroes — Karl the sturdy dwarf, Galandra the balanced skirmisher, Cider the acrobatic rogue, and Brome the spell-slinging wizard — and see how each of them brings unique abilities and motivations to the battlefield.

Explore dangerous lands, battle brutal bosses, unlock powerful upgrades, and uncover the mystery of Azra’s rule over Talamh.

Will you defy the Sun King and change the fate of this world?

© 2025 Absolum, a game developed by Supamonks, Guard Crush and Dotemu, and published by Dotemu. Absolum, Dotemu and their respective logos are trademarks, trademark applications or registered trademarks. All other trademarks, re
title: Absolum - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10015745

Rise Eterna 2 builds on the tactical RPG foundations of its predecessor, immersing players in a riveting tale of war, vengeance, and intrigue. Step into the shoes of Jacht, a loyal Athracian soldier driven by a mission to reclaim his Empire’s lost glory and destroy Lua's Heroes Army. As two families fight for the kingdom's throne and one warrior plots her revenge, every decision you make will shape the course of the conflict.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Rise Eterna 2 - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
AMD’s Jack Huynh, SVP and GM, Computing and Graphics Group, and Mark Cerny, lead architect of PS5 and PS5 Pro, discuss the latest developments from Project Amethyst – the collaboration between Sony Interactive Entertainment and AMD focused on Machine Learning-based technology for graphics and gameplay – a shared commitment to push gaming technology forward. Mark and Jack share three gaming technology breakthroughs that will lead to benefits across the gaming industry in the future.

#playstation #amd
title: From Project Amethyst to the Future of Play: AMD and Sony Interactive Entertainment’s Shared Vision
